description: My go-to, 5-minute vegan hot chocolate made with simple ingredients you always have on hand. Creamy, luxurious, and surprisingly healthy.
name: 5-Minute Vegan Hot Cocoa
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 Tbsp dairy-free semisweet chocolate (chips or bar // chopped)

recipeInstructions.text: Add almond milk to a large mug and microwave for 1 minute. Alternatively, add to a saucepan over medium heat.
Once milk is warm, add cocoa powder, chocolate and sweetener and whisk to combine.
Put back in microwave or continue cooking on stovetop until completely combined and has reached your preferred temperature.
Taste and adjust sweetness as needed.
Lastly, add in your extract of choice â€“ I think peppermint is truly unbeatable. Stir, and top with coconut whipped cream.
